questions.question_stem: Two players, A and B, alternately and independently flip a coin and the first player to obtain a head wins. Assume player A flips first. Define E_i to be the event that head appears first on the i-th toss. Which of the following statements is true about the sequence of events E_i?
questions.question_stem_html: Two players, A and B, alternately and independently flip a coin and the first player to obtain a head wins. Assume player A flips first. Define Ei to be the event that head appears first on the i-th toss. Which of the following statements is true about the sequence of events Ei?

_choices.text: Neither of the above statements are true.
_choices.text_html: Neither of the above statements are true.
